property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X speed. Xequals double your momentum.R Commit, discard 1 momentum: Before you play an attack as a Reversal, if that attack's difficulty is less than your momentum, the control check for that attack is successful (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you play an attack as a Reversal after this attack resolves, that Reversal gets +X speed and +X damage. X equals your momentum. After that attack you may not play any more attacks as Reversals this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals your momentum minus your opponent's momentum (minimum 0). Any player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals either the speed of the attack preceding this attack in your card pool or your momentum, whichever is higher.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Before you clear this card from your card pool during your End Phase, you may add 1 Reversal from your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if you have at least 1 other card in your card pool.E Commit 3 foundations: This attack gets +X speed. X equals your momentum minus the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack's speed is equals to your momentum. Only playable if your momentum is greater than this attack's speed. This may not increase the speed to more than double the printed speed.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: F: Add either the top or bottom card of your deck to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this card: Your attack played as a Reversal gets +X speed. X equals that attack's printed speed. If your Reversal deals damage, add it to your hand. You may only play 1 more attack as a Reversal this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack either gets +2 speed or +2 damage (your choice).

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: This attack played as a Reversal gets +X speed. X equals half your momentum (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E: If this attack is not blocked, add up to X cards from your staging area to your momentum. X equals your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before your opponent's unblocked attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals double the number of cards in your hand minus the number of cards in your opponent's hand (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Add 1 non-character card from your staging area to your hand. Any player may play this ability.R Discard 1 momentum: Before your opponent's unblocked attack deals damage to you, gain 2 vitality. Any player may play this ability.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals half of the damage dealt (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you take damage from your opponent's attack, gain X vitality. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's hand.R: After your opponent adds any number of cards to their momentum, add up to X foundations or assets from your staging area to your momentum. X equals the number of cards added by your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 non-character card from your staging area to your momentum. Your opponent discards 1 of their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Before your opponent's attack deals damage, you may discard this card from your card pool to gain X vitality. X equals your opponent's character's hand size. If your character is Cammy, X equals your opponent's character's hand size +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 2 momentum: Before you take damage from your opponent's attack, gain X vitality/ X equals your opponent's attack's damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Gain X vitality. X equals the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Add 1 card from your staging area to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent adds any number of cards to their momentum, you may either add 1 card from your card pool to your momentum or add X cards from your hand to your momentum (your choice). X equals the number of cards added to your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before your opponent adds any number of cards to their momentum due to one of their card effects, you add that many cards to your momentum as if you had played that ability instead.Charlie R: After your opponent plays an ability printed on a card in their staging area, your opponent makes a control check against a difficulty of 6. If that check fails, cancel that ability's effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After any player successfully plays an ability, if that ability has already been played this turn, whether printed on the same card or another card with the same name, that player must make a control check against difficulty 6. If that check fails, cancel that ability's effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, choose a card in your opponent's staging area. If there is another copy of that card in play (including your staging area), destroy that card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, after your opponent plays an ability they have already played this turn, you may discard this card from your card pool. If you do, your opponent must make a control check against a difficulty of 6. If that check fails, cancel that ability's effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you add this card to your momentum during your End Phase, add X cards from the top of your deck to your momentum. X equals the difference between your momentum and your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent discards X cards from their momentum. X equals your opponent's momentum minus your momentum (minimum 0). Only playable if you have at least 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability , if they have already played that ability at least twice this turn, whether printed on the same card or another card with the same name, commit 2 cards in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this card: If your attack deals damage, each player chooses either attacks or non-attacks. Each player reveals their momentum and discards any cards of their chosen type from it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is committed, your block modifiers get -2.E Commit: This attack gets -X damage (minimum 1). X equals the number of committed foundations in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Commit any number of assets in your staging area. This attack gets -X damage. X equals the number of committed assets in your staging area. If your character is E. Honda, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Any attack a player is attempting to play as a Reversal gets -1 difficulty.E: If your Reversal deals damage, the control check for your next block this turn gets +X. X equals your Reversal attack's difficulty. Any player may play this ability. Only playable if you have no ready foundations in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card has a mid block of +0.E: If this attack deals damage, your next control check to play an attack as a Reversal gets +X. X equals the damage dealt.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: During this attack's Block Step, it is completely blocked. Only playable if you have more committed cards in your staging area than this attack's speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).If you have no ready foundations in your staging area during your opponent's turn, this attack gets -3 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: When you are attempting to play an attack as a block or a Reversal, the control check gets +2. Only playable if you have no ready foundations in your staging area. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack played as a Reversal deals damage, the next attack your opponent plays this turn gets -X damage. X equals the number of committed cards in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets -2 damage (minimum 1). If you have no ready cards in your staging area then this attack gets -X damage (minimum 1) instead. X equals the number of committed foundations in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 2 momentum: Discard All attacks with a printed damage of 3 or less from your card pool.R: After your attack with damage 3 or less deals damage, place 1 Fei Long token ont his character.R Remove X Fei Long tokens from this character: After your opponent's Draw Step, draw X cards. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard 1 momentum: Discard All attacks with a printed damage of 2 or less from your card pool. If your character is Fei Long, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: If this attack deals 4 or less damage, draw X cards. X equals half the damage this attack dealt (rounded down). Any player may play this ability.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed. Only playable if you have at least 1 other attack with a printed damage of 3 or less in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals 5 or less damage, draw 1 card from either the top or the bottom of your deck (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: Fei Long E: If this attack deals damage, discard it from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attacl deals 4 or less damage, discard All attacks with a printed damage of 3 or less from your card pool. Draw X cards. X equals the number of attacks discarded this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Discard the attack with the lowest printed damage preceding this attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your attack deals 4 or less damage, draw 1 card. If your attack is a kick, draw 2 cards instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: Discard All attacks from both players' card pools. Each player draws X cards. X equals the number of attacks discarded from either player's card pool due to this ability (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Once per turn after your opponent resolves a form if your opponent has more momentum than you, they discard X cards from their momentum. X equals your opponent's momentum minus your monentum. Only playable if you have at least 1 momentum.R Discard 1 card: Before you make a control check, that check gets +3. Your opponent adds 1 card from the top of their deck to their momentum. Your opponent's next control check this turn gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard X momentum: Before you make a control check, that check gets a bonus equal to double the number of momentum discarded for this ability and the next control check your opponent makes this turn gets +X.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, each player's next control check this turn gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Add 1 card from the top of your deck to your momentum. Only playable if you have less momentum than your opponent. Either player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, each player's next control check this turn gets +X. X equals the damage dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, you may either add X cards from the top of your deck to your momentum or discard X cards from your opponent's momentum (your choice). X equals your opponent's momentum minus your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards X cards from their momentum and then each player's next control check this turn gets +X. X equals your opponent's momentum minus your momentum (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you make a control check, that check gets +X. Your opponent's next control check this turn gets +X. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent discards 1 momentum. Only playable if you have less momentum than your opponent.Ibuki R Commit: After you make a control check, that check gets +1. Your opponent's next control check this turn gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Until the beginning of your next turn, if a player has more momentum than their opponent, any time a card would be added to that player's momentum it is discarded instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals the control of the foundation committed for this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 3 foundations: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the amount of vitality you have gained this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, gain 2 vitality. Either player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 other card in your staging area: Gain X vitality. X equals the difficulty of the card committed for this ability.E Commit: Once per turn, your attack gets +X speed. X equals the difference between the amount of vitality you started the turn with and your current vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation, discard 2 momentum: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the difference between your vitality and your maximum vitality (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, either the next attack you play this turn gets +X speed or you gain X vitality (your choice). X equals the total number of committed foundations in each player's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After an attack gets a speed bonus, gain X vitality. X equals the attack's speed bonus. If your character is Juli, gain 2 additional vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Choose a committed foundation in your staging area. Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the chosen foundation's difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 3 momentum: This attack gets +X speed. X equals your maximum vitality minus your vitality (minimum 0).

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E Discard 3 momentum: This attack gets +X speed. X equals your maximum vitality minus your vitality (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an attack (not as a block), they commit X cards in their staging area. X equals the difference between the number of cards in your hand and the number of cards in your opponent's hand.E: If your opponent's attack deals damage, add 1 Reversal from your discard pile to your hand. Discard 1 card at the end of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent's attack deals damage, your opponent commits X cards in their staging area. X equals half the amount of damage dealt (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: Before you discard an attack played as a Reversal from your card pool during either player's End Phase, add it to your hand instead. Any player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, choose 1 asset or foundation in your opponent's staging area. The chosen asset or foundation does not ready during your opponent's next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: If this attack played as a Reversal deals damage, take up to 2 Reversals from your discard pile and add them to your hand. Discard 2 cards at the end of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: If this attack deals damage, any of your opponent's foundations that are committed when the damage is dealt do not ready during their next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Add 1 other attack played as a Reversal from your card pool to your hand. Discard 1 card at the end of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent's attack is unblockable. After their attack deals damage, you may play a Reversal from your hand as though their attack was blocked. If that Reversal deals damage, add it from your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit X foundations: Your opponent commits X of their foundations. X may not be more than half of the number of your opponent's ready foundations (rounded up).

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: F: Commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals 3 or more damage, draw 2 cards.E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets -X damage. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's hand minus the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your attack deals damage, draw X cards. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's hand minus the number of cards in your hand (minimum 0).

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, draw the bottom card of your deck. Only playable if you have drawn cards this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets -2 damage (minimum 1). Only playable if you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent. Any player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card. Only playable if you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent has in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, draw X cards. X equals the amount of damage dealt.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent's first attack next turn gets -X damage (minimum 1). X equals your character's hand size minus the number of cards in your hand (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets -2 damage (minimum 1). Only playable if you have no ready foundations in your staging area. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, draw X cards from either the top or the bottom of your deck (your choice). X equals the number of other attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, discard X cards from your hand and then draw X cards from either the top or the bottom of your deck (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Once per turn reveal your hand. If you have at least 2 different attacks in your hand, your opponent chooses 1 of those attacks. If this chosen attack has the Reversal keyword, that attack gets -2 difficulty fot the rest of this turn. If not, that attack gets the Reversal keyword for the rest of this turn. Only playable during your opponent's attack.R Commit: After your opponent checks a 5 or 6, they re-check (only one re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays an ability that gives one of your control checks a penalty, cancel that ability's effects.Rose R: After your opponent checks a 4, 5, or 6, they re-check (only one re-check per control check). For the rest of the turn, after you check a 6, re-check (only one re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: Whenever any player checks a 6, they re-check (only one re-check per control check).E: If your opponent's attack deals damage, you may play an attack as a Reversal as if you had blocked their attack. Any player can play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).The control check to play this attack cannot be modified.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0.When you make the control check to play this attack, if you check a 6 add the checked card to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent checks a 5 or 6 for the control check to block this attack, they re-check (only one re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent plays an ability that gives one of your control checks a penalty, cancel that ability's effects.R Commit: After your opponent checks a 6, they add the checked card to their momentum and re-check (only one re-check per control check). Add 1 card from the top of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that modifies one of your control checks or control values, cancel that ability's effects. If you fail your control check, re-check (Only one re-check per control check).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you re-check a control check, discard a card from your hand to use as the checked card instead of the top card of your deck for that re-check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit X foundations: If your attack deals damage, add it to the bottom of your deck. X equals your attack's speed.E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets -X damage (minimum 1). X equals this attack's speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, add All attacks with a speed of 3 or less from your card pool to the bottom of your deck. If your character is Vega, discard this card form your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets -X damage (minimum 1). X equals this attack's speed. Any player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If both this attack and the next attack you play this turn deal damage, add both of those attacks from your card pool to the bottom of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is in your card pool as a result of playing it as a block, after your opponent plays an attack you may add this card from your card pool to the bottom of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent's first attack next turn gets -X damage. X equals the number of cards you have added from your card pool to the bottom of your deck this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, add X cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck and then add X cards from your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, commit 1 foundation: This attack gets -X damage (minimum 1). X equals this attack's damage minus its speed (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Add 2 cards from your card pool to the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add it to the bottom of your deck. Only playable if you have at least 1 card played as a block in your card pool.
